activities: dinCloud receives personal information when users sign up for cloud services on its website www.dincloud.com in order to setup & validate their account. Information such as name, title, organization, address, phone number, email and credit card information is collected online.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Our self-certification covers ALL data collected via ANY means (digital or manual)
privacyprograms: We have a self-regulatory scheme wherein our security committee (CEO, CTO, VP's) meet quarterly to review/discuss/revise issues, feedback, complaints, and revisions/enforcement to the current systems, processes and people engaged in the privacy and security aspects of our business.
recoursemech: dinCloud customers may raise a concern via opening a ticket at http://support.dincloud.com/ with us directly or independently via the Better Business Bureau http://www.bbb.org/sanjose/  who then contacts us and coordinates from there until resolved.
